text:
Company: Rice PLC
Role: Switchboard Operator

About Us:
Rice PLC is a leading provider of innovative solutions, dedicated to delivering exceptional customer experiences. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment, where everyone can thrive.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Switchboard Operator to join our team. As the first point of contact for our customers, you will be responsible for handling incoming calls, directing calls to the appropriate departments, and providing exceptional customer service.

Responsibilities:

 Answer and direct incoming calls in a timely and professional manner
 Provide excellent customer service, resolving customer inquiries and concerns
 Maintain accurate records of calls and customer interactions
 Collaborate with team members to ensure seamless communication
 Stay up-to-date with company products and services to provide accurate information to customers

Qualifications and Experience:
 Must possess excellent communication and problem-solving skills
 Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with minimal supervision
 Proficiency in switchboard operations and customer service software
 1-2 years of experience in a similar role

Perks and Benefits:
 We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from £25,000 to £30,000, based on your experience and skills.
 20 days of annual leave, plus bank holidays
 Opportunities for professional development and growth
 A dynamic and supportive work environment
